pageTitle: Bursa Malaysia Company Announcements: Company announcements: TAMBUN, APFT, SENDAI, CSL, YEELEE, GOLDIS, KPS, MAXIS
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {11629=We refer to the announcements in relation to the Proposals dated 21 June 2013, 15 July 2013 and 17 July 2013.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {30921=16.07.2013, 43143=This Announcement is dated 19 July 2013., 44282=The Board of Directors of Goldis Berhad wishes to announce that on 19 July 2013, the Company received a cash consideration of RM22.4 million from the Purchasers and a sum of RM8 million towards the full settlement of the Inter-Co Loan., 43475=Reference is made to the Company’s announcements dated 8 July 2013 and 9 July 2013 in relation to the disposal of 3,500,000 ordinary shares in Macro Kiosk Berhad (“MKB”) by Goldis Berhad (“Goldis”) to Mr Goh Chee Ken, Mr Goh Chee Heng and Mr Goh Chee Seng (“the Purchasers”) for a total consideration of RM22.4 million, being the consideration for the sale shares (“Sale Consideration”) (“Proposed Disposal”)., 9038=This announcement is dated 19 July 2013., 8418=On behalf of the Company, M&A Securities Sdn Bhd wishes to announce that the Bonus Issue of Warrants was completed following the listing of and quotation for the 78,500,000 Warrants on the Main Market of Bursa Malaysia Securities Berhad on 19 July 2013.}
